text: Andriy Lyashenko (; born 11 June 1998) is a professional Ukrainian football midfielder who plays for Volyn Lutsk. Lyashenko is a product of the FC Volyn Youth Sportive School System. Then he signed a professional contract with Volyn Lutsk in the Ukrainian Premier League. He made his debut in the Ukrainian Premier League for Volyn on 24 July 2016, playing in the match against Dnipro. == References == ==External links== *Profile at Official FFU Site (Ukr) * Category:Living people Category:1998 births Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Slovakia Category:Ukrainian expatriate sportspeople in Slovakia Category:Expatriate footballers in Kyrgyzstan Category:Ukrainian expatriate sportspeople in Kyrgyzstan Category:Association football midfielders Category:Ukrainian Premier League players Category:FC Volyn Lutsk players Category:FC DAC 1904 Dunajská Streda players Category:FC Rukh Lviv players Category:Ukrainian First League players
title: Andriy Lyashenko
